channel.title: Radio Russell
channel.description: A collection of podcasts, interviews, and audio clips from Russell Heimlich.

item.title: Email of the Week on the Coolness Roundup Podcast
item.description: My question was picked as the Email of the Week even though it was a Skype message.

item.title: Interview with Phil Leigh from InsideDigitalMedia.com
item.description: Phil Leigh wanted the perspective of a college student about the trends occuring in digital media.

item.title: Call in to The Profit Doctors Radio Show
item.description: The Profit Doctors was having a special show about Digg.com. I called in and gave them my 2 cents.
